DOC.detailed_description: In physiological situation , adequate amount protein necessary promote health well know . However , adequate protein intake , show kinetic amino acid delivery organism influence efficiency protein utilization . In particular , casein , slowly digest milk protein , promote good protein balance rapidly digest milk soluble protein young subject ( Boirie et al. , 1997 ) . In addition , change protein feed pattern ( 80 % daily protein consume noon vs 25 % ) significantly affect protein balance ( Arnal et al. , 2000 ) . In young healthy individual , best protein efficiency obtain spread protein absorption time ( casein , and/or 4 isoproteic meal per day ) . On contrary , old individual , due alteration sensitivity protein metabolism feeding , good use rapidly digest protein ( Dangin et al. , 2003 ) , / protein-rich meal day ( Arnal et al. , 1999 ) . Another physiological situation study regard obesity . Obesity incidence rapidly increase around world . When body mass index ( weight / height2 ) become high ( > 30 ) , often suggest restrict energy intake . However , severe energy restriction lead fat mass loss , also lean body mass loss , prevent . Our aim test whether adequate amount total protein , possible preserve lean body mass use either casein , milk soluble protein , change protein feed pattern .
